category.category_uz: Non va non mahsulotlarini ishlab chiqarish

title: Electric oven with 3 decks, 6 trays US-V2-FKB-3
title_en: Electric oven with 3 decks, 6 trays US-V2-FKB-3
short_description: Among the necessary equipment in the production of bread and bakery products, ovens are the most necessary. Of course, they differ from each other in size and capacity. This US-V2-FKB-3 model electric oven has 3 decks, 6 trays, voltage 380V, power 19.5 kW, and the size is 1230*800*1550 mm is enough. The table below summarizes other models of the same equipment and they differ from each other in terms of parameters and prices.
short_description_uz: Non va non mahsulotlari ishlab chiqarishda kerakli bo'lgan uskunalar orasida eng keraklisi - pechlardir. Albatta ular hajm va sig'imlari bilan bir-biridan farqlanadi.Ushbu US-V2-FKB-3 modeldagi elektr pech 3 qavat, 6 podnosli, 380V kuchlanishga ega, 19.5 kW quvvatga ega va o'lchami 1230*800*1550 mm ni tashkil etadi. Quyidagi jadvalda xuddi shu uskunaning boshqa modellari ham jamlangan va ular bir- biridan parametrlari va narxlari bilan farqlanadi.
short_description_ru: Среди необходимого оборудования при производстве хлеба и хлебобулочных изделий наиболее необходимыми являются печи. Конечно, они отличаются друг от друга размерами и мощностью. Эта электрическая духовка модели УС-В2-ФКБ-3 имеет 3 этажа, 6 подносей, напряжение 380В, мощность 19,5 кВт, а размеров 1230*800*1550 мм вполне достаточно. . В таблице ниже представлены другие модели одного и того же оборудования, которые отличаются друг от друга по параметрам и ценам.

long_description:
Among the necessary equipment in the production of bread and bakery products, ovens are the most necessary. Of course, they differ from each other in size and capacity. This US-V2-FKB-3 model electric oven has 3 decks, 6 trays, voltage 380V, power 19.5 kW, and the size is 1230*800*1550 mm is enough. The table below summarizes other models of the same equipment and they differ from each other in terms of parameters and prices.

Non va non mahsulotlari ishlab chiqarishda kerakli bo'lgan uskunalar orasida eng keraklisi - pechlardir. Albatta ular hajm va sig'imlari bilan bir-biridan farqlanadi.Ushbu US-V2-FKB-3 modeldagi elektr pech 3 qavat, 6 podnosli, 380V kuchlanishga ega, 19.5 kW quvvatga ega va o'lchami 1230*800*1550 mm ni tashkil etadi. Quyidagi jadvalda xuddi shu uskunaning boshqa modellari ham jamlangan va ular bir- biridan parametrlari va narxlari bilan farqlanadi.
